data.title: Meggitt Vietnam Company Limited
data.meta_description: Building on more than 2 decades of success in Vietnam, the facility of Meggitt Vietnam (in Dong Nai & Ho Chi Minh) has been doubled in size to 120,000 square feet and will become a global centre of excellence and low-cost manufacturing and supply chain base. The facility offers a broad range of capabilities for the aerospace and energy markets, producing items including motors, position sensors, transformers, electronic assemblies and electrical harnesses, for customers including Airbus and Boeing.
